experience.description: Responsible for ensuring product compliance with international export regulations.
Assessing the legality of transactions and operations or financial solvency.

Cooperating with a Compliance team, Creating and maintaining KYC records by obtaining information from internal and external sources, Validating the information within KYC records and customer identification documents to ensure completion and accuracy, Ensuring KYC records incorporate local regulatory requirements / global standards.

Preparation, development, due diligence, and approval of the electronic Know Your Client (KYC) record (CDD&EDD) Cooperating with a Compliance team Creating and maintaining KYC records by obtaining information from internal and external sources Validating the information within KYC records and customer identification documents to ensure completion and accuracy Ensuring KYC records incorporate local regulatory requirements / global standards.
Investigated activities of institutions to enforce laws and regulations, Assessing the legality of transactions and operations or financial solvency.
